content: this is a bottom up cowl with eyelet and garter stitch details that only requires a single skein of sock yarn **materials ** peepaloofields sock yarn 400 yards/100g example is knit in bikini **needles & notions** us 7 4 5 mm 32 circular needle 3 stitch markers tapestry needle blocking supplies **gauge** no gauge necessary **finished measurements** after blocking approximately 19 long 16 wide at the bottom 12 wide at top visit my etsy shop for the perfect yarn https //www etsy com/shop/orangejellyfishdream ref=hdr_shop_menu
